colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014A *, ,(CES BSANGS KYI @014B CHO GA DNGOS GRUB KYI GZI 'OD 'BAR BA NGO MTSAR RIN PO CHE PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RIGS RUS CHO 'BRANG SOGS YON TAN DU MA'I DPAL GYIS MNGON PAR MTHO ZHING, KHYAD PAR RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA BSTAN 'DZIN LA ME PHYED PA'I DAD PA DANG LDAN PA, RNAM PAR DPYOD PA'I MIG YANGS GA-YO BAS SHES BYA'I DKYIL 'KHOR MTHA' DAG LA GZIGS PA GSAL BA SOGS, DAM PAS BSNGAGS PA'I YON TAN DANG LDAN PA, LCANG RA NAS SDE PA RIN PO CHE DON GRUB RAB BRTAN SKU MCHED KYI BKAS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, DPAL 'KHOR BDE CHEN DU SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG, PHYOGS DUS THAMS CAD DU DGE BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
